vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.3.6;
son of: Paseah (H6454I)
§ Joiada or Jehoiada = "Jehovah knows"
1) son of Paseah, who assisted to repair the old gate of Jerusalem
2) son of the high priest Eliashib in the time of Nehemiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Paséah; reconstructor del muro; post exílico; (b) יְהוֹיָדָע   hijo de Eliasib; sumo sacerdote; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶何耶大 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和華知道"
1) 巴西亞的兒子,協助耶路撒冷古門的修復 #尼 3:6|
2) 尼希米時期大祭司以利亞實的兒子
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
耶何耶大 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和华知道"
1) 巴西亚的儿子,协助耶路撒冷古门的修复 #尼 3:6|
2) 尼希米时期大祭司以利亚实的儿子

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Neh.12.10;
son of: Eliashib (H0475N);
father of: Johanan (H3110L) and son_of_Joiada (H3111I); also called Jehoiada at Neh.13.28;
§ Joiada or Jehoiada = "Jehovah knows"
1) son of Paseah, who assisted to repair the old gate of Jerusalem
2) son of the high priest Eliashib in the time of Nehemiah
